ErrorCode.name: AcsStartServices
ErrorCode.description: The status of starting the ACS services, optionally with an exception list.

ErrorCode.name: ServiceAlreadyRunning
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The requested service is running already.
ErrorCode.description: The requested service is running already and therefore cannot be started.

ErrorCode.name: ServiceNotRunning
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The requested service is not running.
ErrorCode.description: The requested service is not running and therefore cannot be stopped.

ErrorCode.name: ProcessingAborted
ErrorCode.description: Command processor thread has been stopped before the request was processed.

ErrorCode.name: CannotUseInstance
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Instance is in use and cannot be used.
ErrorCode.description: Failed to use requested instance because it is in use.

ErrorCode.name: BadArguments
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Command line arguments wrong or missing.
ErrorCode.description: Command line arguments wrong or missing.

ErrorCode.name: PortInUse
ErrorCode.description: Failed to process request because service port is in use.
